snippet: Paul George scored 25 points and David West had 18 to help the Indiana Pacers beat host Philadelphia, 101-94, sending the 76ers to their 19th straight loss.
abstract: Indiana Pacers beat Philadelphia 76ers, 101-94, sending 76ers to their 19th straight loss; other basketball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Paul George scored 25 points and David West had 18 to help the Indiana Pacers beat host Philadelphia, 101-94, sending the 76ers to their 19th straight loss.
